verses.verse: For this <S%G5484>cause<s%> <S%G5127><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1198>prisoner<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%>

If <S%G1489><s%> ye have <S%G191>heard<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3622>dispensation<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> which is <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> you-ward: <S%G5209><s%>

How <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G602>revelation<s%> he made <S%G1107>known<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3466>mystery;<s%> <S%G2531>(as<s%> I wrote <S%G4270>afore<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> few <S%G3641>words,<s%>

Whereby, <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3739><s%> when ye <S%G314>read,<s%> ye <S%G1410>may<s%> <S%G3539>understand<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4907>knowledge<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ)<s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G1074>ages<s%> was <S%G3756>not<s%> made <S%G1107>known<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> it is <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G601>revealed<s%> unto <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit;<s%>

That <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> should <S%G1511>be<s%> fellow <S%G4789>heirs,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the same <S%G4954>body,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4830>partakers<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1860>promise<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> gospel: <S%G2098><s%>

Whereof <S%G3739><s%> I was <S%G1096>made<s%> a <S%G1249>minister,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1431>gift<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> effectual <S%G1753>working<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1411>power.<s%>

Unto <S%G1698>me,<s%> who am less than the <S%G1647>least<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G40>saints,<s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G1325>given,<s%> that I should <S%G2097>preach<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G421>unsearchable<s%> <S%G4149>riches<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> to make all men <S%G5461>see<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3466>mystery,<s%> which <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> beginning of the <S%G165>world<s%> hath been <S%G613>hid<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> who <S%G2936>created<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

To the intent <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G746>principalities<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1849>powers<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> places might be <S%G1107>known<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4182>manifold<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%>

According <S%G2596><s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G165>eternal<s%> <S%G4286>purpose<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G4160>purposed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> Lord: <S%G2962><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3954>boldness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4318>access<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4006>confidence<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G846>him.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> I <S%G154>desire<s%> that ye <S%G1573>faint<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2347>tribulations<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

For this <S%G5484>cause<s%> <S%G5127><s%> I <S%G2578>bow<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1119>knees<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>
Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G3965>family<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> is <S%G3687>named,<s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> he would <S%G1325>grant<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4149>riches<s%> of <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G1391>glory,<s%> to be <S%G2901>strengthened<s%> with <S%G1411>might<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2080>inner<s%> <S%G444>man;<s%>

That <S%G5547>Christ<s%> may <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith;<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> ye, being <S%G4492>rooted<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2311>grounded<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%>

May be <S%G1840>able<s%> to <S%G2638>comprehend<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G40>saints<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4114>breadth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3372>length,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G899>depth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5311>height;<s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> to <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> which <S%G5235>passeth<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> ye might be <S%G4137>filled<s%> <S%G1519>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4138>fullness<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> unto him that is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> exceeding <S%G5228>abundantly<s%> <S%G1537><s%> <S%G4053><s%> <S%G5228>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> we <S%G154>ask<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3539>think,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> that <S%G1754>worketh<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2254>us,<s%>

Unto <S%G846>him<s%> be <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1519>throughout<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1074>ages,<s%> world without <S%G165>end.<s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
